channel.title: How to make rares non spawn
channel.description: yes i wanted to make a 317 pk spawn server so i set the pickup command to playerights 0 and i dont want players spawn all rares how can i make them non-spawnable? like : ::pickup 1038 'this item isnt spawn-able' hot to make that please help :3
